name: Crystal Plaza Hotel

reviews.title: Every Room Has A Chandelier!
reviews.text: This was a very nice hotel, by European standards. Good sized if sparsely furnished room, sizeable bathroom, tv with movies. And yes, every room has a crystal chandelier! Location great, everything walkable. Staff very helpful. Complementary breakfast has many items (try the waffles!). Would stay again without hestitating.

reviews.title: Lovely hotel
reviews.text: Stayed at the Crystal Plaza for 2 nights during April. Kept an open mind about the hotel prior to arrival due to the small amount we were paying for our stay. What a pleasant surprise we had. Excellent location, rooms a very good size which isn't always the case in a City.

reviews.title: Great place
reviews.text: The staff were so pleasant and helpful and we had everything we could have wished for. The breakfast was lovely and you didn't have to wait for a table. Our room was cleaned and beds made up and we were only out of the room for about 15 minutes!

reviews.title: A real jewel
reviews.text: Would definately recommend this hotel and if we were to return to Stockholm, this would be our choice of accommodation.

reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel
reviews.text: I read on the tripadvisor that the breakfast was great in this place.

description: Traditional Hotel housed in an historic, turn-of-the-century building dating from 1895.
